Summary: Flew over UFO on surfaceat 1000 ft
divs: Sighting DetailsDennis Thomas and I were flying a 185 wheel aircraft from Crooked Creek to AniakAlaska. Enroute we flew over an object that appeared to resemble one of themilitary early Warning site structures. When we returned an hour or so later itwas gone. I have personally flown the entire area on many occasions and thereis nothing, not even a beer can in the area. I am now 56 as is Dennis. I haveover 20,000 hours as a bush pilot in Alaska. I have seen more than most andthis has stayed with me. I see Dennis on occasion and we cant say much aboutthis. We are going to die with this knowledge and your site looks serious.PS Im very inventive now. See www.greatlandlaser.comBest RegardsJim OMeara
trends: There have been no other sightings in Crooked Creek
This sighting has never been favorited.
